name: PathDAO
description: PathDAO is a community-first, decentralised autonomous organisation (DAO) that creates value for investors and players in the growing blockchain gaming and metaverse. Unlike other guilds, PathDAO is focused on banking the unbanked via play to earn, bringing more opportunities to players in developing countries to earn cryptocurrencies. From their earnings, players will be able to participate in DeFi financial services. The guild have brought in more than 1000 scholars into games like Axie Infinity, Vulcan Forged, and League of Kingdoms.
